title: Duck terrine and ginger-plum salsa
ingredients: ['300 g (10Â½ oz) boneless breasts', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '400 g (14 oz) leeks, thinly sliced', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 orange', 'a few fresh bay leaves', '55 g (2 oz) French beans, trimmed', '1 tbsp chopped fresh thyme', '1 tbsp brandy', 'salt and pepper', 'orange slices or segments to garnish', 'Ginger-plum salsa', '450 g (1 lb) ripe dessert plums, stoned and finely chopped', '1 piece preserved stem ginger, finely chopped', '2 tbsp orange juice', 'freshly grated nutmeg']
